@khadine868 @khadine868 you're welcome.

data.text:
Happy International Women’s Day! 
At Caribbean Airlines, we continue to REdefine the workplace, and stand with women all across the globe to foster gender equality today for a sustainable tomorrow.

#REcalibrated #iflycaribbean
#internationalwomensday #iwd #iwd2022
#breakthebias https://t.co/ojctj2u1y6
